caption.p: Aflatoxin production from different fraction of A. flavus strains. (a-b) Microscopic analysis of vacuole-vesicles stained with neutral red commonly used for staining of the vacuoles in vivo. (c) TLC assessment of aflatoxin B 1 (AFB 1) production from different fractions of WT, ∆fab1, and ∆fab1::fab1 strains
